Module com.vnd.mco2restructure
Package com.vnd.mco2restructure

Class WindowManager

java.lang.Object
com.vnd.mco2restructure.WindowManager
public class WindowManager extends Object
The WindowManager class manages the different views and scenes in the vending machine simulator application. It handles navigation between different screens and provides methods for displaying various views.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    WindowManager(javafx.stage.Stage window)
    Creates a new WindowManager with the main application stage.

  • Constructor Details

    • WindowManager

      public WindowManager(javafx.stage.Stage window)
      Creates a new WindowManager with the main application stage. Initializes the ProgramData instance and sets up the views and controllers.
      Parameters:
      window - The main stage of the application.

  • Method Details

    • gotoHomeView

      public void gotoHomeView()
      Navigates to the Home view. Sets the main stage's scene to the Home scene.

    • gotoMntFeaturesView

      public void gotoMntFeaturesView()
      Navigates to the Maintenance Features view. Sets the main stage's scene to the Maintenance Features scene. Updates the MaintenanceService view with the current maintenance data.

    • stock

      public void stock(ArrayList<ItemEnum<? extends Item>> itemEnums, ArrayList<StockEditInfo> stockEditInfos)
      Stocks items in the vending machine with the provided item enums and stock edit information.
      Parameters:
      itemEnums - The list of item enums to be stocked.
      stockEditInfos - The list of stock edit information for each item.

    • collectMoney

      public void collectMoney()
      Collects money from the vending machine. Initiates the collection animation and updates the maintenance service view.

    • gotoVndFeaturesView

      public void gotoVndFeaturesView()
      Navigates to the Vending Features view. Sets the main stage's scene to the Vending Features scene. Updates the VendingMachineController and MaintenanceService view with the current vending machine data.

    • gotoAnimationScene

      public void gotoAnimationScene(String[] steps)
      Navigates to the animation scene and starts the specified animation steps.
      Parameters:
      steps - The steps of the animation to be displayed.

    • gotoItemBuyView

      public void gotoItemBuyView(int slotIndex)
      Navigates to the Item Buy view for the specified slot index. Sets the main stage's scene to the Item Buy scene and updates the ItemBuyController view.
      Parameters:
      slotIndex - The index of the slot for the item to be bought.

    • gotoStockView

      public void gotoStockView(int slotId)
      Navigates to the Stock view for the specified slot ID and vending machine type. Sets the main stage's scene to the Stock scene and updates the StockController view.
      Parameters:
      slotId - The ID of the slot to be displayed.

    • setStockView

      public void setStockView(boolean isSpecialVendingMachine)
      Set the stock view depending on the type of vending machine
      Parameters:
      isSpecialVendingMachine - boolean value if the vending machine is special

    • setStockManagerStock

      public void setStockManagerStock(ItemEnum<? extends Item> itemEnum, int index)
      Sets the stock manager's stock for the specified item enum at the given index.
      Parameters:
      itemEnum - The item enum to set for the stock manager.
      index - The index of the slot to set the item enum.

    • gotoChangeItemPriceView

      public void gotoChangeItemPriceView()
      Navigates to the Change Item Price view. Sets the main stage's scene to the Change Item Price scene.

    • gotoDisplayTransactionsView

      public void gotoDisplayTransactionsView()
      Navigates to the Display Transactions view. Sets the main stage's scene to the Display Transactions scene.

    • gotoStockManagerView

      public void gotoStockManagerView(boolean isResetStockEnum)
      Navigates to the Stock Manager view. Sets the main stage's scene to the Stock Manager scene. Updates the StockManagerController view and optionally resets the stock enums.
      Parameters:
      isResetStockEnum - Flag indicating whether to reset the stock enums.

    • gotoStockEditView

      public void gotoStockEditView()
      Navigates to the Stock Edit view. Sets the main stage's scene to the Stock Edit scene. Updates the StockEditController view.

    • gotoCurrentMntLayout

      public void gotoCurrentMntLayout()
      Navigates to the currently active maintenance layout. Sets the main stage's scene to the current maintenance layout. Updates the MaintenanceService view with the current maintenance data.

    • getCollectMoneyView

      public javafx.scene.layout.VBox getCollectMoneyView(int money)
      Creates and returns a VBox containing the Collect Money view for the specified amount of money.
      Parameters:
      money - The amount of money to be collected.
      Returns:
      The VBox containing the Collect Money view.

    • getCollectDenomView

      public javafx.scene.layout.VBox getCollectDenomView()
      Creates and returns a VBox containing the Collect Denomination view for replenishing denominations.
      Returns:
      The VBox containing the Collect Denomination view.

    • getPaymentView

      public javafx.scene.layout.VBox getPaymentView(int slotIndex, int itemPrice)
      Creates and returns a VBox containing the Payment view for the specified slot index and item price.
      Parameters:
      slotIndex - The index of the slot for the item to be bought.
      itemPrice - The price of the item to be bought.
      Returns:
      The VBox containing the Payment view.

    • resetCurrentFeaturesView

      public void resetCurrentFeaturesView()
      resets current mnt layout to the mnt features layout

    • getWindow

      public javafx.stage.Stage getWindow()
      Returns the main application stage.
      Returns:
      The main application stage.
